headline: Warren Buffett Bet on Modelo Beer Maker, Exited Ulta Beauty—How His Portfolio Changed in Q4
summary: Warren Buffett's Berkshire Hathaway entered a new position in beer and spirits-maker Constellation Brands in the fourth quarter of 2024, while trimming several stakes and exiting Ulta Beauty.
